en.zmejelov_intro_OG: is an upgraded version of the original game that comes with a story. For beginners, the game is quite difficult, so quite a lot of help is implemented. The game automatically saves your progress, so you can pause at any time and continue when you feel like challenging yourself again.
en.please_login: To play, please log in or register.

en.a1_OG: Game progress is saved automatically at the begining of each level?
en.a2_OG: Reload the page, but if the problem persist don't hasitate me to contact me with the form?
en.a3_OG: Because you died and where are dead people? In the graveyard! Joke aside, it is because you are playing HARD difficulty and you died without unlocking any checkpoint

en.welcome_intro: Welcome to Zmejelov Gaming platform, my name is Zmeja and I am quite an important person here (if you ask me 游땒). On the portal there are 5 games with different tricks, traps, each game also has its own achievements to motivate you. Try to become the best on the leaderboard, comment and connect with friends! If you ask me it is totally worth it to spend hours here. What do you say, are you ready to start exloring the world of advantures and excitment?
